DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether behavioural/structural intervention Stepping Stones Creating Futures reduce incidence intimate partner violence urban informal settlement amongst young people . Half participant receive intervention , half control wait-list , receive intervention final data collection .
DOC.brief_title: Stepping Stones Creating Futures Intervention Trial
DOC.criteria: Normally resident informal settlement cluster Not formally employ Able communicate main study language ( English , isiZulu , iXhosa ) Under 18 Mental deficit ( learn difficulty , mental illness substance abuse )
